articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Government Economic Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Government Economic Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with the visiting government economic delegation of the Syrian Arab Republic led by Minister of Culture Loubana Mouchaweh which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 The head of the delegation said that while staying in the DPRK she could see for herself the Korean people building grand monumental edifices, united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 She expressed hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two fraternal countries would grow stronger in various fields.
					
					 Present there were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Haissam Saad, Syrian charge d' affaires ai here.
